original: @79a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @79a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: t'a ki ni badzra gu hya g'i ti n'a ma /
analyzed: t'a ki ni badzra gu hya g'i ti n'a ma /
translated: Dakini-vajra-guhya-geeta-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gsang ba'i glu zhes bya ba /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gsang ba'i glu zhes bya ba /
translated: The Song of the Vajra-Secret of the Dakinis

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Lady Nairatmya.

original: au dum b'a ra'i autpala rgyun du 'khrungs pa dkon //
analyzed: au dum b'a ra'i autpala rgyun du 'khrungs pa dkon //
translated: The udumbara flower blooms but rarely.

original: g-yul ngo mi ldog gyad kyi dgos pa stor //
analyzed: g-yul ngo mi ldog gyad kyi dgos pa stor //
translated: The hero who does not retreat from battle loses his purpose.

original: nor bu'i gling nas stong 'dab byed nus sam //
analyzed: nor bu'i gling nas stong 'dab byed nus sam //
translated: Can one empty the jewel island?

original: 'khor lo'i rtsibs la zhon pa'i skyes bu brel //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rtsibs la zhon pa'i skyes bu brel //
translated: The man who rides the spokes of a wheel is in a hurry.

original: chu bo chen po'i rgyun 'di bcad mi nus //
analyzed: chu bo chen po'i rgyun 'di bcad mi nus //
translated: The current of a great river cannot be stopped.

original: lcags kyi pha wang gyen la 'dril bar dka' //
analyzed: lcags kyi pha wang gyen la 'dril bar dka' //
translated: It is difficult to roll an iron boulder uphill.

original: nyi zla'i 'khor lo rlung gis bzlog mi nus //
analyzed: nyi zla'i 'khor lo rlung gis bzlog mi nus //
translated: The wind cannot stop the sun and moon.

original: mig ser nad kyis btab na dung yang ser //
analyzed: mig ser nad kyis btab na dung yang ser //
translated: If one is afflicted with jaundice, even a conch appears yellow.

original: byang blta'i phug par nyi zla'i 'od mi 'char //
analyzed: byang blta'i phug par nyi zla'i 'od mi 'char //
translated: The light of the sun and moon does not shine in the northern cave.

original: skyes bu rang srog dor ba'i dpa' bo blun //
analyzed: skyes bu rang srog dor ba'i dpa' bo blun //
translated: The fool who is a hero to give up his own life.

original: dug ni srog gi bdud yin mngar yang dor //
analyzed: dug ni srog gi bdud yin mngar yang dor //
translated: Poison is the demon of life, even if sweet, it should be abandoned.

original: rba la 'byol ba'i mnyan pa bya btang bskyed //
analyzed: rba la 'byol ba'i mnyan pa bya btang bskyed //
translated: The boatman who avoids the waves is a lazy man.

original: nang la phan pa'i sman ni kha yang bza' //
analyzed: nang la phan pa'i sman ni kha yang bza' //
translated: The medicine that is good for the inside is also eaten by the mouth.

original: punda r'i ka'i sa bon ma mthong ngam //
analyzed: punda r'i ka'i sa bon ma mthong ngam //
translated: Have you not seen the seeds of the pomegranate?

original: lha sras bzod pa che na kun gyis 'khur //
analyzed: lha sras bzod pa che na kun gyis 'khur //
translated: If the prince is very patient, everyone will carry him.

original: tshong dus 'gron po 'brel med tshogs kyi 'gyes //
analyzed: tshong dus 'gron po 'brel med tshogs kyi 'gyes //
translated: The assembly of unrelated travelers in the marketplace is dispersed.

original: sbrang ma rtsi bcud mang bas sdug bsngal skyed //
analyzed: sbrang ma rtsi bcud mang bas sdug bsngal skyed //
translated: The bee suffers because of the abundance of honey.

original: ngal sar mkhar len byed pa'i skyes bu blun //
analyzed: ngal sar mkhar len byed pa'i skyes bu blun //
translated: The fool who builds a house in a place of hardship.

original: sgyu ma'i yul la mkhan po chags mi skye //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i yul la mkhan po chags mi skye //
translated: The magician does not develop attachment to the objects of illusion.

original: brag ca'i sgra 'di stod smad smra mi byed //
analyzed: brag ca'i sgra 'di stod smad smra mi byed //
translated: This echo does not speak of high and low.

original: rmi lam bde sdug 'di ni sad pas stong //
analyzed: rmi lam bde sdug 'di ni sad pas stong //
translated: The happiness and suffering of a dream are empty upon awakening.

original: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur @79b las brul tsho dang po'o /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur @79b las brul tsho dang po'o /
translated: This is the first chapter of the DohƒÅ for the Dakini on the Symbolic Meaning of MahƒÅmudrƒÅ.

original: // / aa ma mthong ba'i bu chung gzhan la yid mi 'chor //
analyzed: // / aa ma mthong ba'i bu chung gzhan la yid mi 'chor //
translated: The young child who has not seen his mother does not trust another.

original: skyes bu skam gyis gdungs pa kha zas gzhan mi 'dod //
analyzed: skyes bu skam gyis gdungs pa kha zas gzhan mi 'dod //
translated: The person tormented by thirst does not desire any other food.

original: mkha' la 'brug sgra bsgrags pas dus kyi yid ches byas //
analyzed: mkha' la 'brug sgra bsgrags pas dus kyi yid ches byas //
translated: The time is trusted by the sound of thunder in the sky.

original: khyim bdag khe mthong las la ngal ba med //
analyzed: khyim bdag khe mthong las la ngal ba med //
translated: The householder sees profit in his work, and does not tire of it.

original: nad kyis nyen pa'i mi ni dpyad la dga' //
analyzed: nad kyis nyen pa'i mi ni dpyad la dga' //
translated: A man who is afflicted with illness delights in treatment.

original: ded dpon nor bu 'dod phyir rtsol ba byed //
analyzed: ded dpon nor bu 'dod phyir rtsol ba byed //
translated: The captain strives for the sake of the jewel.

original: nye zho med pa'i tshang tshol khu rta sgrim //
analyzed: nye zho med pa'i tshang tshol khu rta sgrim //
translated: The cuckoo strives for a nest without harm.

original: drang srong rigs ldan ya nga'i kha zas spong //
analyzed: drang srong rigs ldan ya nga'i kha zas spong //
translated: The sage of the clan abandons food that is disgusting.

original: dor sdebs mthun pa'i glang po rol du bde //
analyzed: dor sdebs mthun pa'i glang po rol du bde //
translated: The elephant is happy in the play of the harmonious rut.

original: dge slong gzhon nu'i bsam pa dran gyis la //
analyzed: dge slong gzhon nu'i bsam pa dran gyis la //
translated: Remember the intention of the young monk.üîΩGo everywhere with a knife that has a sharp edge.

original: til ngar ldan pa'i gri thogs kun du rgyug / mar me'i 'od la btsal thabs legs su gyis //
analyzed: til ngar ldan pa'i gri thogs kun du rgyug / mar me'i 'od la btsal thabs legs su gyis //
translated: Make a good search for the light of the lamp.

original: gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu 'di la ltos //
analyzed: gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu 'di la ltos //
translated: Look at this prince who has been put on the throne.

original: bung bas rtsi bcud ma lus ro gcig sdud //
analyzed: bung bas rtsi bcud ma lus ro gcig sdud //
translated: The bee gathers all the nectar of the flowers into one taste.

original: gyad ni dpung bzhir bcas te dgra dpung 'joms //
analyzed: gyad ni dpung bzhir bcas te dgra dpung 'joms //
translated: The champion defeats the enemy army with the four divisions of his army.

original: rgol ba mi ldog stobs ldan ci yi phyir //üîΩgsang tshig mi sgrub blon po gros mi dbang //
analyzed: rgol ba mi ldog stobs ldan ci yi phyir // gsang tshig mi sgrub blon po gros mi dbang //
translated: Why is the powerful one not turned back by his opponent?üîΩThe minister who does not accomplish the secret words is not consulted.

original: bka' bzhin mi bsgrub rgyal po'i gshed mas spong //
analyzed: bka' bzhin mi bsgrub rgyal po'i gshed mas spong //
translated: The king‚Äôs executioner abandons the one who does not carry out the king‚Äôs orders.

original: srog rgol dgra la bzod par mi rung bsre //
analyzed: srog rgol dgra la bzod par mi rung bsre //
translated: It is not right to be patient with enemies who attack your life.

original: rig byed mkhan po'i rgyud ni shi yang slob //
analyzed: rig byed mkhan po'i rgyud ni shi yang slob //
translated: Even if the teacher of the Vedas dies, his students continue.

original: khrims la gnas pa'i rgyal po sems rgya bskyed //
analyzed: khrims la gnas pa'i rgyal po sems rgya bskyed //
translated: A king who abides by the law should expand his mind.

original: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the second chapter of the DohƒÅ of the Great Seal of Symbols.

original: // / yid bzhin nor bu khur du khur nas kyang //
analyzed: // / yid bzhin nor bu khur du khur nas kyang //
translated: Even though you carry a wish-fulfilling jewel on your back,

original: stobs dang ldan pa'i glang po zhon byas te //
analyzed: stobs dang ldan pa'i glang po zhon byas te //
translated: you should ride a powerful elephant.

original: bdud rtsi gangs kyi zhun ma btung bar bya //
analyzed: bdud rtsi gangs kyi zhun ma btung bar bya //
translated: You should drink the melted snow of nectar.

original: chu bo sgrol ba'i gru la zag lhan gdab //
analyzed: chu bo sgrol ba'i gru la zag lhan gdab //
translated: You should plant stakes in the boat that crosses the river.

original: sgo lnga mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan ltos //
analyzed: sgo lnga mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan ltos //
translated: Look at the reflection of the five sense gates endowed with radiance.

original: srog dang bral ba'i skyes bu de ci sems //
analyzed: srog dang bral ba'i skyes bu de ci sems //
translated: What do you think of this person who is separated from life?

original: mkhan bzos ma byas bse ru'i gzugs la lta //
analyzed: mkhan bzos ma byas bse ru'i gzugs la lta //
translated: Look at the rhinoceros form that is not made by a craftsman.

original: btso sreg ma byas sa bon myu gu'i rgyu //
analyzed: btso sreg ma byas sa bon myu gu'i rgyu //
translated: The seed that is not melted or burned is the cause of the sprout.

original: bram ze skud pa 'khal ba'i drung du sdod //
analyzed: bram ze skud pa 'khal ba'i drung du sdod //
translated: Stay in front of the brahmin who is spinning thread.

original: na bun thibs po 'di ni rlung gis gtor //
analyzed: na bun thibs po 'di ni rlung gis gtor //
translated: This thick fog is dispersed by the wind.

original: glang chen smyon pa 'di ni lcags su gzhug / bung bas me tog rtsi thob phyir mo blta //
analyzed: glang chen smyon pa 'di ni lcags su gzhug / bung bas me tog rtsi thob phyir mo blta //
translated: The bee looks at the flower in order to get its honey.

original: mkha' la 'ja' tshon skyon bral rang sar yal //
analyzed: mkha' la 'ja' tshon skyon bral rang sar yal //
translated: A rainbow in the sky, free of defects, vanishes in its own place.üîΩA traveler, having lost his boat, is anxious to cross the river.

original: 'grul pos chu sgrol gru yi gces 'dzin zhig / mthong byed mig dang bral bas yul rnams 'gags //
analyzed: 'grul pos chu sgrol gru yi gces 'dzin zhig / mthong byed mig dang bral bas yul rnams 'gags //
translated: The eyes being absent, the objects are blocked.

original: rgyal po'i bka' la brnyas na chad pa'i gnas //
analyzed: rgyal po'i bka' la brnyas na chad pa'i gnas //
translated: If one disobeys the king's command, one is subject to punishment.

original: mthon po'i rtse ni lhung ba'i gnas yin gzabs //
analyzed: mthon po'i rtse ni lhung ba'i gnas yin gzabs //
translated: The peak of a high mountain is the place where one falls.

original: 'dab gshog ya 'gal gyis ni 'phur mi nus //
analyzed: 'dab gshog ya 'gal gyis ni 'phur mi nus //
translated: One cannot fly with a wing that is half-developed.

original: @80a * // nam mkha'i cho 'phrul skye 'gro'i dpal du shar //
analyzed: @80a * // nam mkha'i cho 'phrul skye 'gro'i dpal du shar //
translated: A miracle in the sky shines as the glory of living beings.

original: mkha' la char rgyun bab pas rtsi thog 'khrungs //
analyzed: mkha' la char rgyun bab pas rtsi thog 'khrungs //
translated: The rain falling from the sky causes the sprouts to grow.

original: ded dpon rgan po'i gling don gzhan gyi ched //
analyzed: ded dpon rgan po'i gling don gzhan gyi ched //
translated: The old captain's island is for the sake of others.

original: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho gsum pa'o /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho gsum pa'o /
translated: This is the third chapter of the DohƒÅ of the Great Seal Symbols.

original: // / dig mas tshig tu smras pa med //
analyzed: // / dig mas tshig tu smras pa med //
translated: A mute does not speak with words.

original: chu shal zla ba su yis byas //
analyzed: chu shal zla ba su yis byas //
translated: Who made the moon in the water lily?

original: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ngo mtshar che //
translated: The various miracles in the sky are very amazing.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings dang kha dog su yis mthong //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings dang kha dog su yis mthong //
translated: Who can see the colors of the sky?

original: bar snang dangs pa'i nus pa gang gi mthu /
analyzed: bar snang dangs pa'i nus pa gang gi mthu /
translated: What is the power of the potential of the pure space in between?

original: na bun 'di la ngos gzung 'dug gam ci //
analyzed: na bun 'di la ngos gzung 'dug gam ci //
translated: Is there something to identify in this mist?

original: rna dbang sgra la zin pa'i ri dags blun //üîΩdbang po yul gyis non pa'i ri dags ltos //
analyzed: rna dbang sgra la zin pa'i ri dags blun // dbang po yul gyis non pa'i ri dags ltos //
translated: The deer of the ear faculty caught by soundüîΩLook at the deer who is overcome by objects.

original: gnyen po 'phrig dang ldan pas sha ba ltos //
analyzed: gnyen po 'phrig dang ldan pas sha ba ltos //
translated: Look at the deer who has the trembling antidote.

original: chu yi zla ba ma bsgul bzhag na drungs //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba ma bsgul bzhag na drungs //
translated: The moon in the water is clear when left unmoved.

original: til gyi mar me gsal dangs dar dang ldan //
analyzed: til gyi mar me gsal dangs dar dang ldan //
translated: The sesame oil lamp is clear and bright when undisturbed.

original: rmi lam bde ba'i nyams ni sad pas stong //
analyzed: rmi lam bde ba'i nyams ni sad pas stong //
translated: The experience of bliss in a dream is empty upon waking.

original: rgyal pos sa srung ral gris rgol ba 'joms //
analyzed: rgyal pos sa srung ral gris rgol ba 'joms //
translated: The king protects the land and conquers opponents with his sword.

original: khro bo'i gzugs brnyan 'di yis byis pa sdigs //
analyzed: khro bo'i gzugs brnyan 'di yis byis pa sdigs //
translated: This reflection of wrathfulness frightens the childish.

original: gnam lcags thog gi shugs la sra snyi med //
analyzed: gnam lcags thog gi shugs la sra snyi med //
translated: The force of a thunderbolt has no hardness or softness.

original: chu yi zla ba 'di la yid mi gtad //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba 'di la yid mi gtad //
translated: The moon in the water is not to be trusted.

original: 'ja' tshon ngo bos stong pas spang blang med //
analyzed: 'ja' tshon ngo bos stong pas spang blang med //
translated: Since a rainbow is empty by nature, there is nothing to adopt or reject.

original: na bun mkha' la yal ba'i byung sa ltos //
analyzed: na bun mkha' la yal ba'i byung sa ltos //
translated: Look at the source of the mist that vanishes into space.

original: dngos med mun pas khyab pa'i nam mkha' las //
analyzed: dngos med mun pas khyab pa'i nam mkha' las //
translated: From the space pervaded by the darkness of nonentity

original: sna tshogs mdangs dang ldan pa'i lho sprin 'thibs //
analyzed: sna tshogs mdangs dang ldan pa'i lho sprin 'thibs //
translated: The southern clouds, with their various colors, gather.

original: char rgyun du mas 'gro ba'i lo tog rgyas //
analyzed: char rgyun du mas 'gro ba'i lo tog rgyas //
translated: The rain falls in many streams, and the crops of beings grow.

original: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las brul tsho bzhi pa'o /
translated: The fourth part of the song of symbols of the great seal.

original: // / myu gu mgo rtsa gnyis su gyes kyang gcig gi stobs //
analyzed: // / myu gu mgo rtsa gnyis su gyes kyang gcig gi stobs //
translated: Though the sprout has two parts, the top and the root, they are of one strength.

original: chu nang zla ba cha med nam mkha'i cho 'phrul yin //
analyzed: chu nang zla ba cha med nam mkha'i cho 'phrul yin //
translated: The moon in the water is not a part; it is a magical display of the sky.

original: ga bur nus pa 'di yi sman dug byas pa med //
analyzed: ga bur nus pa 'di yi sman dug byas pa med //
translated: The power of camphor is not made by the medicine.

original: chab rom snang yang chu las gud na grub pa med //
analyzed: chab rom snang yang chu las gud na grub pa med //
translated: Though it appears as ice, it is not established apart from water.

original: na bun 'di yi rang bzhin cha med gzung bas stong //
analyzed: na bun 'di yi rang bzhin cha med gzung bas stong //
translated: The nature of this mist is ungraspable and empty.

original: me long nang du gzugs med rkyen shar snang ba tsam //
analyzed: me long nang du gzugs med rkyen shar snang ba tsam //
translated: In a mirror, a form is not present; it is just an appearance that arises from conditions.

original: mo gsham bu yi pham khyod kyis mthong ngam ci //
analyzed: mo gsham bu yi pham khyod kyis mthong ngam ci //
translated: Do you see the defeat of the son of a barren woman?

original: skad cig 'di la dus gsum khong nas dag pa yin //
analyzed: skad cig 'di la dus gsum khong nas dag pa yin //
translated: In this instant, the three times are completely pure.

original: litstsha b'i yis smras pa khyod kyis ji ltar go //üîΩaa lu ngo shes byis pa de dus brid du med //
analyzed: litstsha b'i yis smras pa khyod kyis ji ltar go // aa lu ngo shes byis pa de dus brid du med //
translated: The Licchavi said, ‚ÄúHow do you understand this?‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúA child who recognizes a jackal cannot be deceived by it.

original: 'a tsi ba la'i mtshang rtogs nas ni 'jigs mi dgos //
analyzed: 'a tsi ba la'i mtshang rtogs nas ni 'jigs mi dgos //
translated: Having realized the secret of the ƒÅcƒÅryas, there is no need for fear.‚Äù

original: nor bu lag tu lon pa'i ded dpon dbul dang bral //
analyzed: nor bu lag tu lon pa'i ded dpon dbul dang bral //
translated: The captain who has the jewel in his hand is free from poverty.

original: shel gyi rang bzhin mi 'gyur tshon gyis bcos su med //
analyzed: shel gyi rang bzhin mi 'gyur tshon gyis bcos su med //
translated: The nature of crystal does not change and cannot be altered by dye.

original: nam @80b mkha' ma grub phyir na sprin gyis gang la sgrib //
analyzed: nam @80b mkha' ma grub phyir na sprin gyis gang la sgrib //
translated: Since space is not established, what could the clouds obscure?

original: gser la gzugs brnyan du ma byas kyang gser nyid yin //
analyzed: gser la gzugs brnyan du ma byas kyang gser nyid yin //
translated: Even though many images are not made of gold, they are gold.

original: grib ma gzugs las byung bar shes pas spang blang med //
analyzed: grib ma gzugs las byung bar shes pas spang blang med //
translated: Since the shadow is known to arise from the form, there is nothing to adopt or reject.

original: drang srong rnams kyi rig pas sman dug dbyer ma phyed //
analyzed: drang srong rnams kyi rig pas sman dug dbyer ma phyed //
translated: The knowledge of the sages does not distinguish between medicinal herbs and poison.

original: dbul mo gter dang phrad tshe bcol pa'i las mi byed //
analyzed: dbul mo gter dang phrad tshe bcol pa'i las mi byed //
translated: When a poor woman finds a treasure, she does not have to work.

original: nam mkhas nam mkha' bsten pas nam mkha' phyi nang 'dres //
analyzed: nam mkhas nam mkha' bsten pas nam mkha' phyi nang 'dres //
translated: Since space is supported by space, the outer and inner space mix.

original: spang blang med pa'i nam mkha' la ni 'byung bzhi shar //
analyzed: spang blang med pa'i nam mkha' la ni 'byung bzhi shar //
translated: The four elements arise in the space that is free of adoption and rejection.

original: 'byung bzhi'i rtsal du 'gro ba gso bskyed byas //
analyzed: 'byung bzhi'i rtsal du 'gro ba gso bskyed byas //
translated: The four elements are created and nurtured as the potential of the elements.

original: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las bzla ba'i brul tsho ste lnga pa'o /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las bzla ba'i brul tsho ste lnga pa'o /
translated: From the Garland of the Symbolic Meaning of MahƒÅmudrƒÅ, this is chapter 5: The Examination.

original: // / zhing pa brtson 'grus ldan pa la ;
analyzed: // / zhing pa brtson 'grus ldan pa la ;
translated: The diligent farmer

original: / lus ngag las la du ba pa med //
analyzed: / lus ngag las la du ba pa med //
translated: has no fatigue in physical and verbal activity.

original: mtshan dpes brgyan pa 'khor los sgyur //
analyzed: mtshan dpes brgyan pa 'khor los sgyur //
translated: Adorned with the major and minor marks of a buddha, he is a universal monarch.

original: gdan sar gdon pa'i bya ba gces //
analyzed: gdan sar gdon pa'i bya ba gces //
translated: It is important to perform the rite of enthronement.

original: lha yi bu mo yid 'ong ma //
analyzed: lha yi bu mo yid 'ong ma //
translated: The beautiful celestial maiden

original: sgyu ma tsam du brtse bar bya //
analyzed: sgyu ma tsam du brtse bar bya //
translated: should be loved as an illusion.

original: mdung rtse lnga la ngar blud de //
analyzed: mdung rtse lnga la ngar blud de //
translated: Having empowered the five-pronged vajra,

original: nam mkha'i 'o ma dbug par bya //
analyzed: nam mkha'i 'o ma dbug par bya //
translated: one should pierce the sky-milk.

original: them skas gdang bu bzhi la dbab //
analyzed: them skas gdang bu bzhi la dbab //
translated: It is released on the four steps of the ladder.

original: gzhon dus byis pa zas kyis bkol //
analyzed: gzhon dus byis pa zas kyis bkol //
translated: In youth, the child is enslaved by food.

original: gangs kyi thigs pa mi dbo bar //
analyzed: gangs kyi thigs pa mi dbo bar //
translated: Without spilling the water of the snow,

original: dbyang thag 'dren pa'i thag pa bzung //
analyzed: dbyang thag 'dren pa'i thag pa bzung //
translated: one should hold the rope that pulls the plow.

original: rlung gis mkha' la sbar nas kyang //
analyzed: rlung gis mkha' la sbar nas kyang //
translated: Having set the wind in the sky ablaze,

original: chu bran yur ba gzung bar bya //
analyzed: chu bran yur ba gzung bar bya //
